last_episode_to_air.name: Forever Royal
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Sofia, and siblings Amber and James, prepare for their graduation from Royal Prep Academy, Sofia is called back to the Mystic Isles to face an evil witch named Vor, who is trying to take over the kingdom of Enchancia. Presented with her biggest challenge yet, Sofia must figure out a way to defeat Vor and save her family and the people of Enchancia.

name: Sofia the First
overview: Set in the storybook world of Enchancia, this is the story of Princess Sofia, an adventurous little girl who is learning how to adjust to royal life after her mom marries the king and she becomes a princess overnight.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Lessons at the Royal Preparatory Academy and run-ins with a wicked wizard teach young princess Sofia that true nobility comes from the heart.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Young Princess Sofia returns for more fun-filled adventures, including entering a Flying Derby race and getting stuck inside an enchanted painting.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Underwater kingdoms, adventure clubs and a secret library are just a few of the exciting things Sofia encounters in her royal exploits in Season 3.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Sofia is back for more adventures and heroics, meeting magical creatures and helping her friends confront new enemies.

episodes.name: Just One of the Princes
episodes.overview: Sofia strives to become the first princess to earn a spot on her school's flying derby team. Although paired with the overly-anxious horse Minimus, Sofia learns to believe in herself and proves that a princess can do anything.

episodes.name: The Big Sleepover
episodes.overview: Sofia is put in a difficult position when she struggles to get her village friends Ruby and Jade and her new princess friends to get along during her first slumber party at the castle.

episodes.name: Let the Good Times Troll
episodes.overview: Sofia befriends the trolls that live in the cave near her new home but trouble ensues when her father can't let go of his fear of their banging, even when she brings them to the castle.

episodes.name: Cedric's Apprentice
episodes.overview: Sofia becomes a sorcerer's apprentice and helps him impress a king with a new magic trick.

episodes.name: A Royal Mess
episodes.overview: The Golden Wing Circus is in town and the kids really want to go, but when James accidentally breaks a giant glass window his father was going to surprise his mother with as a result of breaking a castle rule, James and Sofia attempt to hide it while Amber distracts their parents.

episodes.name: The Shy Princess
episodes.overview: Sofia helps a shy classmate overcome her fear of speaking in public; meanwhile, Clover makes friends with a dragon.

episodes.name: Blue Ribbon Bunny
episodes.overview: Sofia decides to enter Clover the rabbit in the Village Faire pet contest, but after pushing a little too hard, Sofia discovers a few things about friendship when she ends up unintentionally hurting his feelings before the contest.

episodes.name: The Princess Test
episodes.overview: Sofia wants to win a new handbag from the Royal Store, but first she must pass the test of putting a princess puzzle together, and along the way she learns that when there's a new thing to do, you have to try it.

episodes.name: Baileywick's Day Off
episodes.overview: Baileywick celebrates his birthday with his brother Nigel, but it goes terribly wrong. With help from Sofia, Baileywick gets a wonderful day.

episodes.name: Tri-Kingdom Picnic
episodes.overview: Sofia attends a royal picnic, but when the pressure of winning causes the other kids to not play, Sofia shows James how to be a good sport.

episodes.name: The Little Witch
episodes.overview: A little witch's hexes cause big trouble for Sofia and her friends. Sofia tries to help Lucinda the witch mend her evil ways. Will Sofia stop the hexes or will chaos have its way?

episodes.name: Two to Tangu
episodes.overview: Sofia and Amber visit Prince Zandar in the kingdom of Tangu but get lost on a magic carpet. Along the way, Sofia and Amber meets Princess Jasmine.

episodes.name: Finding Clover
episodes.overview: Sofia and her Friends go on a daring rescue of their Rabbit friend Clover who is being held by the clutches of Boswell the Magician.

episodes.name: The Amulet of Avalor
episodes.overview: Sofia loses the power to understand her animal friends when her magical amulet is captured by the castle Griffin. So, it is a race between Sofia and Cedric to see who can get it first.

episodes.name: The Buttercups
episodes.overview: Sofia wants to go on a hike with her Buttercup troop, but King Roland insists on sending Baileywick, the castle steward, to keep Sofia safe.

episodes.name: Make Way for Miss Nettle
episodes.overview: A new fairy teacher, Miss Nettle, arrives at Royal Prep to teach royal princes and princesses besides Flora, Fauna, and Merryweather. However, Sofia is suspicious about this new teacher's motives.

episodes.name: The Amulet and the Anthem
episodes.overview: Sofia is chosen to sing the Enchancian Anthem at the annual Harvest Festival. After she becomes a bit too boastful, Sofia's magical amulet bestows a curse on her, leaving her all croaked up! Belle makes an appearance, making her the third original disney princess to appear on the show.

episodes.name: Tea for Too Many
episodes.overview: When Sofia is selected to host a Royal Prep tea party, Amber encourages her to "think big."

episodes.name: Princess Butterfly
episodes.overview: The students at Royal Prep make their own costumes for this year's All Hallows' Eve contest.

episodes.name: Great Aunt-Venture
episodes.overview: When Sofia reluctantly agrees to help Aunt Tilly bake a pie, Sofia thinks she's in for a dull day.

episodes.name: The Baker King
episodes.overview: Sofia helps King Roland see how important his job is as king after he yearns to live a more simple life as a baker.

episodes.name: The Floating Palace: Pt. 1
episodes.overview: During her family vacation on a floating palace, Sofia arrives ta a special cove and befriends a curious young mermaid.

episodes.name: The Floating Palace: Pt. 2
episodes.overview: Sofia tries to find a way to convince her parents to move to the floating palace to save the mermaid kingdom.

episodes.name: Holiday in Enchancia
episodes.overview: A snowstorm prevents King Roland from returning home in time for the holidays. Sofia leads her family on a brave expedition to find him and shows Amber that spending the holiday with loved ones is better than any present. Princess Aurora appears to aid Sofia with a special song.

episodes.name: Four's a Crowd
episodes.overview: Sofia invites Jade and Ruby, her village friends, to join her and her sister, Amber, in the Flylight Pageant, an annual parade of flying coaches.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Lessons at the Royal Preparatory Academy and run-ins with a wicked wizard teach young princess Sofia that true nobility comes from the heart.

episodes.name: Two Princesses and a Baby
episodes.overview: Amber realizes how much her royal twin really means to her after a spell that is supposed to give her and twin James separate birthdays accidentally turns him into a baby.

episodes.name: The Enchanted Feast
episodes.overview: Snow White appears to help Sofia learn the importance of trusting one’s instincts after she suspects that a visiting sorceress is not who she says she is.

episodes.name: The Flying Crown
episodes.overview: Sofia must teach Prince Hugo the meaning of teamwork after Prince James gets injured right before the big flying derby race and Sofia gets paired with Hugo instead.

episodes.name: Mom's the Word
episodes.overview: After Sofia becomes disheartened that she has to share her mom with Amber and James during their annual Mother’s Day picnic, she asks her friend Lucinda, the good little witch, to cast a spell so that she and her mom can be alone and learns a very important lesson about sharing traditions with her new step-siblings.

episodes.name: The Silent Knight
episodes.overview: Sofia meets her hero, the brave but silent knight Sir Bartleby, and helps him to accept his unique voice and woo her Aunt Tilly.

episodes.name: Enchanted Science Fair
episodes.overview: Sofia and her friends get overly competitive while participating in an enchanted science fair project and learn that their friendship is more important than winning the fair.

episodes.name: King for a Day
episodes.overview: With his parents away, James is made king for the day and gets carried away finding fun solutions to royal problems.

episodes.name: When You Wish Upon a Well
episodes.overview: After becoming jealous, Amber makes a wish into a wishing well that accidentally turns Sofia into a cat.

episodes.name: Gizmo Gwen
episodes.overview: Sofia encourages a young kitchen maid named Gwen to pursue her dream of becoming an inventor.

episodes.name: Sofia the Second
episodes.overview: When Sofia finds herself needing to be in two places at the same time, she uses one of Cedric’s magic spells to create a second Sofia, who mischievously wreaks havoc on the castle.

episodes.name: Mystic Meadows
episodes.overview: Sofia visits a magical retirement home for sorcerers and helps Cedric earn his family’s powerful wand and his father’s respect.

episodes.name: Princesses to the Rescue!
episodes.overview: On a royal visit to the Kingdom of Wei-Ling, Sofia, Amber and Princess Jun must work together to rescue their fathers and brothers who are trapped in a jaguar’s den. Disney Princess Mulan makes a special appearance to offer some strategic advice to the young princesses.

episodes.name: Ghostly Gala
episodes.overview: While setting up for a Halloween party in the ballroom, Sofia encounters a ghost set on scaring everyone out of the castle so he can throw his own Ghostly Gala.

episodes.name: The Emerald Key
episodes.overview: After a valuable emerald key from the kingdom of Hakalo washes up on the shore of the castle, Sofia and her family must figure out who the key belongs to when two girls arrive, both claiming to be the princess and rightful owners.

episodes.name: Scrambled Pets
episodes.overview: Sofia and her friends regret their decision to bring their pets to school after Clover and the rest of the animals get scrambled in a sorcery class accident.

episodes.name: The Princess Stays in the Picture
episodes.overview: When Sofia and Hildegard become stuck inside an enchanted painting, Hildegard complicates their escape plan by insisting she knows everything.

episodes.name: Baileywhoops
episodes.overview: When a new castle steward named Slickwell puts a curse on Baileywick in an attempt to take over his job, Sofia and Minimus must figure out a plan to get Baileywick back.

episodes.name: The Curse of Princess Ivy
episodes.overview: Amber discovers Sofia’s amulet is magical and takes it without permission, inadvertently summoning an evil princess, Ivy, who’s set on taking over Enchancia.

episodes.name: Winter's Gift
episodes.overview: Sofia meets a young faun who has been cursed by an Ice Witch.

episodes.name: The Leafsong Festival
episodes.overview: Crackle would love to sing in the Leafsong Festival but fears that she'll have to give up her fire-breathing ability to participate.

episodes.name: Substitute Cedric
episodes.overview: Cedric steps in as substitute teacher for Sofia’s sorcery class and helps the students of Royal Prep protect their school after a group of visiting pranksters arrive to wreak havoc.

episodes.name: Clover Time
episodes.overview: Sofia and Clover learn to be more considerate of others after Clover’s warren gets flooded and Sofia invites him to stay with her, causing friction in their friendship when they realize that they both have very different habits.

episodes.name: In a Tizzy
episodes.overview: After teaming up with an over-eager fairy godmother, Sofia’s friend Ruby learns that a little assistance is nice, but sometimes you have to do things on your own.

episodes.name: A Tale of Two Teams
episodes.overview: When a game of dazzleball pits the villagers against the royals, Sofia must decide whether to play with her old friends or her new family.

episodes.name: The Littlest Princess
episodes.overview: Sofia’s amulet grants her the power to become tiny after she helps three wee sprites, but when she disobeys her mother, her good deed backfires and she loses the ability to grow big again.

episodes.name: Buttercup Amber
episodes.overview: Amber agrees to go on an overnight hike with Sofia and the Buttercups despite her distaste for the outdoors and ends up saving the day when the rest of the troop is trapped by a swamp monster.

episodes.name: Carol of the Arrow
episodes.overview: When Sofia meets her idol, Carol of the Arrow, and joins her merry band of do-gooders, she learns that there are many different ways to help people.

episodes.name: Sidekick Clio
episodes.overview: When Clio helps Sofia practice for the upcoming school musical auditions, Sofia recognizes Clio’s own talents and encourages her to audition too.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Young Princess Sofia returns for more fun-filled adventures, including entering a Flying Derby race and getting stuck inside an enchanted painting.

episodes.name: Cool Hand Fluke
episodes.overview: Sofia returns to the underwater kingdom of Merroway Cove where she is reunited with her mermaid friend Oona and meets a new mer-boy named Fluke.

episodes.name: Minimus Is Missing
episodes.overview: Sofia and Amber discover their flying horses are missing and have been lured into a trap by a young warlock.

episodes.name: Cedric Be Good
episodes.overview: When Cedric finally gets a hold of Sofia's amulet and is repeatedly cursed by the gem, he realizes that the amulet's powers are only granted by acts of kindness.

episodes.name: Princess Adventure Club
episodes.overview: When Princess Zooey, a new student at Royal Prep, starts a Princess Adventure Club to make friends and invites all the princesses to join except Amber, Sofia helps her realize its not nice to exclude others.

episodes.name: Minding the Manor
episodes.overview: When Sofia is left in charge of her Aunt Tilly's house, she must protect it from a group of invading gargoyles.

episodes.name: The Secret Library
episodes.overview: Sofia’s Aunt Tilly returns to give her a gift that will unlock a secret world and appoint Sofia storykeeper of magical books.

episodes.name: New Genie on the Block
episodes.overview: On her way to Tangu to meet Prince Zandar, Sofia accidentally summons a kid genie named Kazeem, who runs loose by granting wishes for many people he runs into in the kingdom. With the help of Genie Patrol Fizz, he and Sofia are hot on Kazeem's trail.

episodes.name: The Fliegel Has Landed
episodes.overview: When an bossy fliegel threatens Sofia's troll friend Gnarlie, Sofia must show him how to stand up for himself.

episodes.name: The Princess Ballet
episodes.overview: When Sofia invites Princess Kari to perform ballet at Royal Prep's open house, she struggles to learn the steps and Sofia must help Kari realize that its okay to not be perfect at everything.

episodes.name: All the Sprite Moves
episodes.overview: Not wanting to move from her old castle Vivian tricks her parents into thinking their new castle is haunted with a little help from Sofia's wee sprite friends. Meanwhile, Clover eats an enchanted Liking Berry in the new castle's enchanted garden and falls head over heels for Crackle, which starts to creep her out.

episodes.name: Sofia in Elvenmoor
episodes.overview: While her father is busy with the royal road crew in the Whispering Woods, Sofia and Clover discover a Silver Tree that leads them to a secret land inhabited by elves. But the royal road crew wants to clear the path by cutting down the Silver Tree. If this happens, the door to Elvenmoor will be closed forever.

episodes.name: Stormy Lani
episodes.overview: Princess Lani controls her kingdom's weather with her moods, but when she loses her temper during a quest, she loses control of her powers. Sofia must teach her to control her temper in order to fulfill her family's legacy.

episodes.name: Lord of the Rink
episodes.overview: Prince Hugo is hesitant to pursue his interest in ice dancing because he thinks it's a sport just for girls.

episodes.name: The Secret Library: Olaf and the Tale of Miss Nettle
episodes.overview: Sofia tries to stop Miss Nettle from stealing all the snowdrop flowers from Freezenberg, but the wicked fairy puts a curse on Sofia's amulet that takes away her ability to talk to animals. Olaf from "Frozen" appears.

episodes.name: Gone With the Wand
episodes.overview: During a trip to Merlin's castle, Cedric's trouble-making niece swipes the famous magician's wand, which summons his arch-enemy Morgana who wants to keep the wand for herself.

episodes.name: Bad Little Dragon
episodes.overview: After Sofia and Vivian find an adorable baby dragon in the woods, they discover he's not as innocent as he first appears.

episodes.name: Bunny Swap
episodes.overview: When Clover and a wild bunny named Barley mistakenly switch places, Clover must rediscover his wild side so he can find his way home.

episodes.name: Her Royal Spyness
episodes.overview: Amber and Sofia learn an important lesson about not spying on others after a peek through Amber's telescope deceives them into thinking that their mother is in danger.

episodes.name: Best in Air Show
episodes.overview: Grand Mum comes to visit Enchancia and Sofia helps Minimus muster the confidence to perform a bold stunt routine in his parents' flying horse show.

episodes.name: Dads and Daughters Day
episodes.overview: Sofia's class goes on a father-daughter trip to the Enchanted park, but Sofia wonders if she truly belongs since Roland is her stepfather.

episodes.name: The Secret Library: The Tale of the Noble Knight
episodes.overview: Sofia visits her secret library and learns the tale of the Noble Knight seeking the Ice Fire Shield.

episodes.name: The Bamboo Kite
episodes.overview: Sofia visits the Kingdom of Wei-Ling to attend the Festival of Kites, where Princess Jun has the honor of launching the first kite.

episodes.name: Beauty Is the Beast
episodes.overview: Sofia helps Princess Charlotte undo a curse that has turned her into a beast.

episodes.name: Cauldronation Day
episodes.overview: Sofia must keep Lucinda's witch friends from ruining her Cauldronation Day.

episodes.name: Camp Wilderwood
episodes.overview: James gets homesick at Camp Wilderwood; James and his friends create a plan to escape.

episodes.name: Royal Vacation
episodes.overview: Miranda plans a family vacation in order to spend quality time together, but it turns out to be the worst vacation ever.

episodes.name: Hexley Hall
episodes.overview: Sofia discovers the incredible mystery behind her amulet. Princess Elena from the Kingdom of Avalor has been magically trapped inside Sofia's amulet for forty-one years, waiting for another Princess to set her free, and Sofia is up to the task!

episodes.name: The Princess Prodigy
episodes.overview: When Princess Vivian receives an offer for an apprenticeship under musician Baron Von Rocha, she starts neglecting her friends and responsibilities. Sofia becomes concerned after learning the music teacher plans to magically steal Vivian's musical talent.

episodes.name: One for the Books
episodes.overview: Sofia helps her fellow student Desmond thrive in their new class.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Underwater kingdoms, adventure clubs and a secret library are just a few of the exciting things Sofia encounters in her royal exploits in Season 3.

episodes.name: Day of the Sorcerers
episodes.overview: After a secret meeting of sorcerers, Cedric must choose between taking over the kingdom and maintaining his friendship with Sofia.

episodes.name: The Secret Library: Tale of the Eternal Torch
episodes.overview: The secret library sends Sofia on a mission to help the dragons of the Blazing Palisades defend their home against invading sea serpents.

episodes.name: The Crown of Blossoms
episodes.overview: Two gnomes arrive in Enchancia to recover their lost Crown of Blossoms, which has been given to Sofia to wear during the kingdom's annual Planting Festival.

episodes.name: Pin the Blame on the Genie
episodes.overview: After Kazeem the genie is accused of wreaking havoc in Tangu, Sofia sets out to prove his innocence.

episodes.name: The Mystic Isles
episodes.overview: Sofia and Amber visit an enchanted new world called “The Mystic Isles” where they encounter some magical new friends, including an enthusiastic unicorn named Skye and mystical human/hawk creatures called Windwalkers. Together with their new friends, Sofia and Amber must stop an evil Crystalmaster named Prisma from covering the isles in crystals.

episodes.name: The Mystic Isles: The Princess and the Protector
episodes.overview: Sofia meets her Protector trainer, a feisty crystal fairy named Chrysta, and travels to the Isle of Forever Frost to begin her first assignment.

episodes.name: The Royal Dragon
episodes.overview: Sofia disguises herself as a dragon to attend the annual Dragon Roast n’ Toast picnic with Crackle and meets her childhood rival, Sizzle.

episodes.name: The Mystic Isles: The Mare of the Mist
episodes.overview: While traveling to the Mystic Isles on a quest, Minimus and Skye compete for Sofia's affection.

episodes.name: Through the Looking Back Glass
episodes.overview: Cedric's sister Cordelia moves into Enchancia Castle and the two siblings can't get along, so Sofia tries to help by taking a peek into their past.

episodes.name: Princess Jade
episodes.overview: Jade goes to Royal Prep on School Swap Day, while Amber takes her place in the village at Dunwiddie School.

episodes.name: Ivy's True Colors
episodes.overview: Sofia’s amulet summons her to rescue a princess in need who turns out to be her former foe, Princess Ivy.

episodes.name: Too Cute to Spook
episodes.overview: Sofia invites her friend Calista to go trick or treating with her and her friends on Halloween.

episodes.name: Pirated Away
episodes.overview: A band of bumbling pirates capture Miranda, Amber, and Sofia.

episodes.name: The Mystic Isles: The Falcon’s Eye
episodes.overview: Sofia enlists the help of Jun, Jin, and Kai to help her and Chrysta stop a shape-shifting villain from helping Prisma obtain the Wicked Nine, nine magical objects that belonged to big time villains.

episodes.name: The Mystic Isles: The Great Pretender
episodes.overview: When Sofia needs an animal helper for an alchemy presentation, she holds an audition to find the perfect assistant.

episodes.name: The Mystic Isles: A Very Mystic Wassalia
episodes.overview: Sofia discovers that Chrysta is filling her day with Protector tasks to keep from admitting she has no family to celebrate the Wassailia holiday with.

episodes.name: The Birthday Wish
episodes.overview: Tizzy's misfired spell causes Sofia to endlessly repeat a disastrous birthday.

episodes.name: In Cedric We Trust
episodes.overview: Cedric had lost his trust from King Roland since he revealed his ambition of taking over the kingdom. He is trying to gain back When the Evil Queen's crown is stolen by Wormwood, Sofia must find a way to retrieve it to save Cedric's reputation. Prisma came to the kingdom to steal one of the Wicked Nine, a powerful crown called Grimhilde's Crown.

episodes.name: The Mystic Isles: A Hero for the Hoodwinks
episodes.overview: After seeing Sofia being rewarded as a Protector, Clover takes her place on a mission in the Mystic Isles.

episodes.name: The Mystic Isles: Undercover Fairies
episodes.overview: Sofia and Chrysta go undercover as fairies to stop a thief from stealing a magical Pixie Cup flower.

episodes.name: A Royal Wedding
episodes.overview: The arrival of the Queen Mum makes everyone question who will be the next king or queen; chaos ensues as Amber and James try to prove who will be the best.

episodes.name: The Royal School Fair
episodes.overview: Sofia must decide the right school for her; James fears he may not be talented enough to make it as a knight.

episodes.name: The Lost Pyramid
episodes.overview: Sofia is a regular girl who is whisked into a world of royalty when her mother marries a king.

episodes.name: Return to Merroway Cove
episodes.overview: While visiting Oona and the rest of the mermaids in Merroway Cove, Sofia saves a new Mermaid Protector from an underwater Sea Twister.

episodes.name: The Elf Situation
episodes.overview: When Sofia, Amber and James are left in charge of the castle, they attempt to make peace between the River Elves and the Tree Elves.

episodes.name: Forever Royal
episodes.overview: As Sofia, and siblings Amber and James, prepare for their graduation from Royal Prep Academy, Sofia is called back to the Mystic Isles to face an evil witch named Vor, who is trying to take over the kingdom of Enchancia. Presented with her biggest challenge yet, Sofia must figure out a way to defeat Vor and save her family and the people of Enchancia.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Sofia is back for more adventures and heroics, meeting magical creatures and helping her friends confront new enemies.
